mapper.insert: insert into purchaseqplan (ID, Purchaseq_No, Purchaseq_TotalPrices, Purchaseq_TotalQuantity, Purchaseq_Reason, Purchaseq_SupplyTime, Purchaseq_Registrant, Purchaseq_RegistrantTime, Purchaseq_Remark, auditor, auditorTime, CheckMark) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{purchaseqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purchaseqTotalprices,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{purchaseqTotalquantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purchaseqReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purchaseqSupplytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{purchaseqRegistrant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purchaseqRegistranttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{purchaseqRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{checkMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update purchaseqplan set Purchaseq_No = #{purchaseqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Purchaseq_TotalPrices = #{purchaseqTotalprices,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Purchaseq_TotalQuantity = #{purchaseqTotalquantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Purchaseq_Reason = #{purchaseqReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Purchaseq_SupplyTime = #{purchaseqSupplytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Purchaseq_Registrant = #{purchaseqRegistrant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Purchaseq_RegistrantTime = #{purchaseqRegistranttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Purchaseq_Remark = #{purchaseqRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auditor = #{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auditorTime = #{auditorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CheckMark = #{checkMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, Purchaseq_No, Purchaseq_TotalPrices, Purchaseq_TotalQuantity, Purchaseq_Reason, Purchaseq_SupplyTime, Purchaseq_Registrant, Purchaseq_RegistrantTime, Purchaseq_Remark, auditor, auditorTime, CheckMark from purchaseqplan where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select ID, Purchaseq_No, Purchaseq_TotalPrices, Purchaseq_TotalQuantity, Purchaseq_Reason, Purchaseq_SupplyTime, Purchaseq_Registrant, Purchaseq_RegistrantTime, Purchaseq_Remark, auditor, auditorTime, CheckMark from purchaseqplan
